pr_title: Archaius2 dynamic proxy for Spring environment

timeline.message: Archaius2 dynamic proxy for Spring environment

timeline.bodyText: wouldn't it be safer to just ignore this method and consider it not a configurable property? Especially as we are looking at all methods, including the inherited ones from parent interfaces.
timeline.author: fabiokung

replies.bodyText:
We cannot just ignore them. We could either:

execute them if a default implementation is provided (our type is interface not a class)
throw an exception if the method is called by the client, but do not fail eagerly in the constructor
replies.author: tbak
